blocks.heading: How FinSecure Capital Deployed a Private, Open-Source LLM for Document Analysis in 48 Hours
blocks.description: They needed to run LLMs on PII with zero data egress. A DIY build was soaking engineering time with no timeline. We installed an on-prem gateway, tuned open-source models, and proved lower latency and cost.

features.heading: The Challenge
features.description: Process KYC and contract docs in-house. No data may leave the perimeter. Public APIs were slow and expensive. The internal project drifted without clear SLOs.

accordionItems.label: How do you prove zero data egress?
accordionItems.content: Default-deny firewall + Kubernetes NetworkPolicy, scripted egress probes (hourly), and signed logs. We include the egress test pack and data-flow diagram for audits.

accordionItems.label: Do we need GPUs?
accordionItems.content: Recommended for throughput and p95. Typical start: 4Ã— L40S (or A100/H100 equivalents). CPU-only is fine for light loads or batch jobs; we share a sizing guide.

accordionItems.label: Will our apps need changes?
accordionItems.content: Minimal. We expose an OpenAI-compatible endpoint, so existing clients usually point to a new base URL. Auth and rate limits are configured in the gateway.
